position: SWE @Google | IIT Kharagpur | Ex- Ather Energy

experience.title: Product Development and Engineering Intern
experience.description: • Built a 3-tier Enterprise Resource Planning framework to streamline Ather Energy’s goal to ramp up the production capacity by 3x• Performed bottleneck analysis across 150+ BOM parts across vendors by evaluating 1K+ manufacturing processes using Google Sheets & AppScript• Achieved a 10x reduction in inference time for bottleneck analysis of manufacturing processes by shifting to recursive CTE3 subroutine in BigQuery• Developed an interactive Google Data Studio dashboard that tracked important KPIs including manpower and inventory across 10+ vendors
experience.description_html: • Built a 3-tier Enterprise Resource Planning framework to streamline Ather Energy’s goal to ramp up the production capacity by 3x• Performed bottleneck analysis across 150+ BOM parts across vendors by evaluating 1K+ manufacturing processes using Google Sheets & AppScript• Achieved a 10x reduction in inference time for bottleneck analysis of manufacturing processes by shifting to recursive CTE3 subroutine in BigQuery• Developed an interactive Google Data Studio dashboard that tracked important KPIs including manpower and inventory across 10+ vendors

experience.title: Data Analyst Intern
experience.description: • Accomplished cleaning and preprocessing data, implementing several graph algorithms, and arranging the data for accurate parsing using GraphQL.• Achieved integrating the entire prototype on Full-stack modules like React, Node.js, etc and Cloud platforms like Firebase, and developed an architecture for storing and managing data on NEO4j.
experience.description_html: • Accomplished cleaning and preprocessing data, implementing several graph algorithms, and arranging the data for accurate parsing using GraphQL.• Achieved integrating the entire prototype on Full-stack modules like React, Node.js, etc and Cloud platforms like Firebase, and developed an architecture for storing and managing data on NEO4j. <!---->

experience.title: Core Organising Team Member
experience.description: • Co-led a team of 42 affiliates and 100+ volunteers ensuring the successful execution of Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur’s annual techno-management symposium• Partnered with 3 nationwide outdoor media bodies to campaign yearly initiatives throughout Eastern India• Secured funding of INR 100K through partnerships with corporates in Telangana • Conducted the Boeing IIT National Aero-Modeling Competition (event with the highest prize-money)
